abstract: Mail.ru Group, a Russian investor in Facebook, surged as much as 41 percent in London trading after raising $912 million in the city’s biggest initial public offering since July, Bloomberg News reported.
snippet: Mail.ru Group, a Russian investor in Facebook, surged as much as 41 percent in London trading after raising $912 million in the city’s biggest initial public offering since July, Bloomberg News reported.
lead_paragraph: The Mail.ru Group, a Russian investor in Facebook, surged as much as 41 percent in London trading after raising $912 million in the city’s biggest initial public offering since July, Bloomberg News reported.

headline.main: Mail.ru, Facebook Backer, Up 41% After London I.P.O.
